column3: Description
Gives an introduction to the tables, incl. information on
copyright and disclaimer.
Presents an overview of the pulse species for which compiled
nutrient values are given in PulsesDM and their respective
food item IDs used in the actual datasheets (sheets 04-06)
Gives an overview of all components that are covered by the
uPulses datasheets (sheets 04-05), listing INFOODS tagnames,
descriptions, recommended units, max. decimal places and
significant digits used.
Presents compiled nutrient values per 100 g EPDM for raw,
processed and cooked foods -without information on statistics
and documentation per component.
Presents compiled nutrient values per 100 g EPDM with
documentation per component.
Presents compiled amino acid values per g nitrogen for raw,
processed and cooked foods - includes information on
statistics and documentation per AA.
Lists retention factors applied according to the preparation
method.
Presents the entire reference list with the corresponding ID
